quotes: If nothing last forever, will you be my nothing?
Lets flip a coin! Heads, you're mine; Tails, I'm yours.
How can I spell s_cess without 'U' or c_tie, or _niq_e? I can't even have f_n or good l_ck without 'U'. Looks like I just can't s_rvive without... 'U'.
I'm not flirting. I'm just being extra nice to someone who is extra attractive.
I know milk does good for the body but DAMN how much did you drink?
You don't know how much I love you yet. You just stay there and let me prove it to you!
You may fall from the sky, you may fall from a tree, but the best way to fall... is in love with me
If you were a tear, I would never cry in fear of losing you
I'm like a kid in a candy store looking for that perfect piece of candy, then you came along and became the sweetest thing in my world.
FLIRTATIONSHIP: More than a friendship, less than a friendship.
I wish is was a teddy bear, that lay upon your bed, so every time you cuddled it, you cuddled me instead.
Flirting is the art of making a man feel pleased with himself.
If loving you is wrong I don't want to be right.
I think of you only twice a day, when I am alone and when I am with someone else.
I'm single, not because it's what I like. I'm single because I'm waiting for you.
Hershey makes a million kisses a day, I'm just asking for one.
You look so beautiful... You make me forget my Pickup line!!
If I could rearrange the alphabet I'd put you and I together.
I'm not flirt, all I'm doing is pointing out your beautiful features.
Don't call a girl flirt when she's just trying to be nice, and don't call a girl obsessed when she's just in love.
Hey last time I looked at my keyboard, I noticed that 'U' and 'I' are always together.
